* She nearly toppled to the ground as the base heaved and groaned, being 
lifted off the ground by the shuttles as it was.
Desmonus hissed in annoyance and flapped her wings a few times to regain her 
balence, finally making it to a wall where she could steady herself and try 
and catch up on what was going on.
She clinged to the wall a bit, flapping her wings until they settled 
comfortably over her shoulders.
With her senses she closed her amber optics and took in everything, even 
down to the faint sound of the shuttles overhead.
The base was being moved...and by the slightly shift of the base and sound 
of the shuttles...they were just now passing over water.

Desmonus opened her optics again and slowly began to move down the hall, 
keeping a nice hold on the walls. She wondered slightly of just where they 
were going, and if there would be plenty of victims there.
But before she had the chance to think about feeding again the ship gave a 
sharp jerk and her grip on the wall failed.
She slammed against the corner of a hallway before she went flying down in, 
a surprised yell ripped from her lips.

But then suddenly she slammed up against something hard, slightly. But 
little did she knew that it was another bot, BloodyStrike in fact.*



>The shuttles carrying the Alliance base reach the ocean, flying
>ahead. They would soon reach the island the Iron Fist was at.
>
>At the Iron Fist, work drones (no guns or anything) were clearing an
>area of the island for the Alliance base. The island was a half-
>circle, with the Iron Fist floating in the indent. It was about three
>miles away from the mainland. Metal plates covered the sides of the
>island, running down toward the ocean floor.
>
>Island map (just a general idea of what it looks like. NOT exact,
>just general):
>
>     _____________
>    /             \
>   /   Old Base    \
>   |    _______    |
>   |   /  IF   \   |
>   \__/         \__/
>
>
>
>

>from her

>she was.

>
